main_definition: Used to indicate source or provenance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to indicate source or provenance.
meanings_and_examples.example: I got a letter from my brother.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to indicate a starting point or initial reference.

meanings_and_examples.example: After twenty minutes, remove the cake from the oven.
A parasol protects from the sun.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Produced with or out of (a substance or material).
Used to indicate causation; because of, as a result of.
meanings_and_examples.example: Too many people die from breast cancer.
